verbose_text: The overexpression of DJ-1 by transfection with a DJ-1 overexpression plasmid exerted protective effects against HG induced H/R injury, as evidenced by increased CCK-8 levels and SOD activity, the decreased release of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) and the decreased MDA content, and increased nuclear factor (erythroid derived 2)-like 2 (Nrf2) and heme oxygenase-1 (HO-1) expression.
